DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to localise brain regions involved in objects recognition, in planification and adjustment of grasping, in prehension with and without eye control. The study is conducted in normal and autistic adults. We hypothesize different activations in these two populations.
DOC.brief_title: fMRI Study of Grasping in Autistic Patients
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of autistic disorder, righthanded, DQ>50 epilepsia, psychotropic drugs
